markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Phase Bullet](/Feats.aspx?ID=3270) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 141</row>

**Archetype** [Spellshot](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=122)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Spellshot Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3267)

</column>

---

You can aim your bullets not just in three normal dimensions, but in additional dimensions as well, allowing you to fire a magical shot that phases through everything but your target. Make a crossbow or firearm Strike against a foe who's [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to you (but not [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39)). The ammunition travels to your target in a straight line, passing through any non-magical barriers or walls in its way, though magical barriers and [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) effects stop the bullet. The shot ignores all cover, the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition, the hidden condition, and circumstance bonuses to AC from shields. It has a +4 status bonus to hit creatures wearing any type of armor. The Strike's damage can't be reduced with a [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction using a non-magical shield.
name: Phase Bullet

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Phase Bullet Single Action Source Guns & Gears pg. 141 Archetype Spellshot Frequency once per day Prerequisites Spellshot Dedication --- You can aim your bullets not just in three normal dimensions, but in additional dimensions as well, allowing you to fire a magical shot that phases through everything but your target. Make a crossbow or firearm Strike against a foe who's observed or hidden to you (but not undetected). The ammunition travels to your target in a straight line, passing through any non-magical barriers or walls in its way, though magical barriers and force effects stop the bullet. The shot ignores all cover, the concealed condition, the hidden condition, and circumstance bonuses to AC from shields. It has a +4 status bonus to hit creatures wearing any type of armor. The Strike's damage can't be reduced with a Shield Block reaction using a non-magical shield.
